mimodek.facade
Class Facade

java.lang.Object
  mimodek.facade.Facade
Direct Known Subclasses:
MadridPradoFacade, ProcessingFacade
public abstract class Facade
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class to define the methods and attributes that every implementing class must provide. This allows to configure Mimodek for any display without making any change to the core.

Author:
Jonsku

Method Detail

addListener

public void addListener(FacadeEventListener listener)

pre

public void pre()
Called automatically by the sketch just before drawing. Don't call it yourself, it won't do any good.

Calculates the mouse position in the space of the facade and restore previous drawing.

showDrawingArea

public void showDrawingArea()
Draws the boundaries of the drawing area used by the facade

togglePreview

public void togglePreview()
Switch the preview on/off

draw

public abstract void draw()
Called automatically by the sketch just after drawing. Don't call it yourself, it won't do any good.

.If the field on is true then a preview of the facade is drawn, else does nothing.

See Also:
on

isInTheScreen

public abstract boolean isInTheScreen(processing.core.PVector coordinate,
                                      float margin)
Test if the coordinates of the vector are in the screen.

Parameters:
coordinate - a PVector holding the coordinates to test
margin - used to define a margin, set to 0 to test entire area
Returns:
true if the coordinates are in the screen, false otherwise

Test if the given coordinates are in the screen.

Parameters:

Returns:
